This is a directory in the Travel Blog applications source code for storing external files.
These files will not affect the Android app size, and will not be packaged in the .apk.

These screenshots may be used in the Google Play Store submission.

These are also likely to be used for linking externally: for example:
http://code.google.com/p/travel-blog-android/source/browse/external/edit-location.jpg
may be used on the wiki pages of the UserGuide.
